note.p: Burial: In the cemetery adjoining Greenwich churchyard, London
Education: Utrecht; MD (1679); Incorporated at Oxford (1680); Incorporated at Cambridge (1681)
Career: Practised in London; retired to Bath because of a 'pituitous cough â€¦ due to the thick London air' (1715)
Memberships: FRCP (1685); Society for the Propagation of the Gospel
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; DNB; Hunter; Foster; Innes Smith
References: Marie Boas Hall, 'Frederick Slare, FRS (1648-1727)' in NR 1992 vol 46 pp 23-41
